channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Wire cage damaging tree, 17th July
item.description:
The wire cage is rubbing against the bark of this tree and damaging it the cage and post should be removed as the tree has grown so much since it was planted.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21a, Cumberland Road, Shortlands, London

item.title: Off my driveway on a public path, 17th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whitehall Lane, North End, London
